div.p: Indicates whether the team is current , represents future intentions or is now a historical record.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/careteam-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The care team is in development or awaiting formation
The care team is current and actively involved in patient care.
The care team is no longer current and actively involved in patient care.
The care team has been dispanded (though it may have been replaced by a new care team).
